title: Bannon: Trump “is going to have to rethink his legal team”
text:
In an interview airing Sunday on AM 970 “The Answer,” Bannon told host John Catsimatidis that Giuliani had gotten “over his skis” in his contacts with Ukrainian government officials urging President Volodymyr Zelensky’s administration to open a criminal investigation into former Vice President Joe Biden (D)…

“Rudy Giuliani, whom we all admire, and many of us love, looks like he may have gotten over his skis on some of this situation in Ukraine. I think the president’s going to have to rethink his legal team,” Bannon said.

“Right now the numbers are going the wrong way. And Nancy Pelosi is trying to drive this home.… and she will use the mainstream media as her weapon to overturn the election of Donald Trump,” the former Breitbart News chief added.
